short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A highly customizable dark theme for eBay homepage and search

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a dark theme for the eBay website that uses invert filter to bring the night mode to eBay. This extension offers custom CSS injection in case the user needs to change anything like using a custom font-family or font-size. The extension offers a toolbar button which is toggleable. You can simply toggle the extension on and off. The extension supports all localized version of the eBay website as well as the ".com" one.
